tier.item: (33) Russian

Ivan already got.used, that his story.ACC not believe.3PL or understand.3PL it.ACC
kak-to izvrashchenno. Oni ved' ne vstrechalis' s d'javolom.
somehow perversely. They indeed not have.met with devil.

perversely. Unlike him, they haven't met the devil.'
